Zak Greene

Zak Greene is a designer and developer based in Brooklyn. Born and raised in Detroit, he has a fondness for stories and ideas from the margins of society, an interest in finding new ways to tell them. He has worked on print publications born out of Occupy Wall Street, including the Occupied Wall Street Journal and Tidal, and currently works with Strike Debt! on web projects. Previously heâ€™s worked with C&G Partners on interactive exhibits, and studied at Rhode Island School of Design.
